string: Culturing HUDEP-2 cells as previously described<sup>16</sup>.
refer: In the sentence provided, "as previously described" refers to the method or procedure for culturing HUDEP-2 cells that has been mentioned or explained before.

string:
Generating HUDEP-2 single cell clones (monoclonal cell population)

Single cell clones can be established from Lenti A&C-BEmax treated cells containing various genotypes to interrogate the relationships between the genotype and phenotype.

Day 21-22: Seed cell into 96-well

Seed HUDEP-2 cells into 96-well culture plates through limited dilution as previously described17.
refer: The phrase "as previously described" refers to the process of seeding HUDEP-2 cells into 96-well culture plates through limited dilution.
